page.title: 07CLUBS IN STURTON
page.content: THE VILLAGE HALL,BEING THE MAIN CENTRE FOR ENTERTAINMENT,IS HIRED OUT FOR WEDDINGS & SOCIAL FUNCTIONS AS WELL AS THE FOLLOWING:-{WOMEN'S INSTITUTE { SPINNERS,WEAVERS & DYERS {FRIENDSHIP CLUB (PENSIONERS) {PLAYGROUP MUMS & TODDLERS { DRAMA GROUP CONSERVATIVE ASSN MEETING IN THE METHODIST CHAPEL ARE{ {THE WOMEN'S FELLOWSHIP & BROWNIE/GUIDE {PACKS. THE YOUTH CLUB}MEETS IN THE YOUTH WING AT THE SECONDARY SCHOOL. DURING THE YEAR THE ABOVE CLUBS PROVIDE MANY EVENTS,PRIMARILY FUND RAISING,FOR THE COMMUNITY,E.G.{MARKETS {JUMBLE SALES,MUSICAL EVENINGS,PLAYS, {PANTOMIMES AND DANCES}IN ADDITION TO THEIR NORMAL MEETINGS. THE W.I.HAVE HANDBELL RINGERS. PEOPLE ARE INVOLVED IN{MORRIS DANCING & SINGING.}THE SECONDARY SCHOOL HAS A{SUMMER FAIR & COOKS{CHRISTMAS LUNCH FOR PENSIONERS
